attributes.action: To make it illegal to park in parent and child with out young children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to start a petition to stop people with out young children parking in parent and child spaces. On countless times I have seen people without young children parking in parent and child parking spaces, I think it should be made illegal to park in these places as it is for people to park in disabled spaces.

This is not a requirement to *provide* such spaces, but simply to enforce such spaces where they are already provided. It would be no more difficult to police than existing disabled spaces: see a car in a parental space without child seats and take the appropriate enforcement action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
